pr_title: bugfix:  fix Propagation.REQUIRES_NEW and add some comments

timeline.message: bugfix: fix REQUIRES_NEW not send begin request to TC

Merge remote-tracking branch 'remotes/upstream/develop' into bugfix-tm-propagation-new

# Conflicts:
#	spring/src/main/java/io/seata/spring/tcc/TccActionInterceptor.java
拆分部分代码到另一个分支。

timeline.bodyText: 这注释里的伪代码方法，不是seata现有的api。这个地方，是不是可以参考spring事务，给清晰的注释就好了，就比如你上面的2句，已经足够清晰了。加这个代码，使用者用的时候如果看了这里，会不会有个错觉，他用这个传播属性，还得照着这个模板编码。。。。。。代码示例，应该多是指导用户去编码的，这个代码示例，感觉是指导写框架的人的，但是方法又不是seata里的方法。。。（个人看法，探讨一下）
timeline.author: lightClouds917
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -19,37 +19,125 @@ * Propagation level of global transactions. * * @author haozhibei + * @see io.seata.spring.annotation.GlobalTransactional + * @see io.seata.tm.api.TransactionalTemplate */ public enum Propagation { /** * The REQUIRED. + *

+ * If transaction is existing, execute with current transaction, + * else execute with new transaction. + *

+ * 
+     *     if (tx == null) {
+     *         tx = beginNewTransaction(); // begin new transaction, is not existing

replies.bodyText:
我参照了JDK里的一些代码的注释。也是写了一些伪代码，来表示这个方法的基本逻辑。
我觉得应该没有人会弄错吧。
replies.author: wangliang181230

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/tm/src/main/java/io/seata/tm/api/transaction/Propagation.java b/tm/src/main/java/io/seata/tm/api/transaction/Propagation.java index 406b6cae5..364743fd3 100644 --- a/tm/src/main/java/io/seata/tm/api/transaction/Propagation.java +++ b/tm/src/main/java/io/seata/tm/api/transaction/Propagation.java @@ -114,7 +114,7 @@ public enum Propagation { /** * The NEVER. *

- * If transaction is not existing, throw exception, + * If transaction is existing, throw exception, * else execute business without transaction. *

*

timeline.bodyText: 从清晰的语义上来说，这里existingTransaction 是不是比 tx == null 这种更清晰些。
timeline.author: lightClouds917
